item.title: Book with ONYX in February to receive exclusive discounts
item.description: Source: Onyx web page.Â Several ONYX Hospitality Group properties are offering special deals for the Chinese New Year. To celebrate the Year of the Monkey, guests can enjoy up to a 20% discount at the Oriental Residence Bangkok or at one of the 25 participating Amari, OZO, Shama, and Mosaic Collection hotels. These offers are available at locations in Thailand, Sri Lanka, mainland China, Hong Kong, Qatar, and Bangladesh.
